kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Opens a new SSH connection to the given ``host`` and ``port``.

kw.name: Login
kw.msg: Read output: Last login: Wed Feb 26 15:49:23 2025 from 10.100.1.52 [?2004h[root@CBM-2022070504 ~]#
kw.doc: Logs into the SSH server with the given ``username`` and ``password``.

kw.name: Execute Command
kw.msg: ${passwd_content} = root:x:0:0:root:/root:/bin/bash bin:x:1:1:bin:/bin:/sbin/nologin daemon:x:2:2:daemon:/sbin:/sbin/nologin adm:x:3:4:adm:/var/adm:/sbin/nologin lp:x:4:7:lp:/var/spool/lpd:/sbin/nologin sync:x:5:0:sync:/...
kw.doc: Executes ``command`` on the remote machine and returns its outputs.
